Subject: Re: DrillBit arrives

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138
From: Rudra656@...

::Cygnar::
    "For the moment you don't.  The idea is to get inside the Trainer 
defenses.  First we're sending the Destrocons and Halucigen in to cause a 
ruckus.  They need to go in with a show.  We want them to know that the 
distraction is coming."  He turns to Ramjet and Halucigen.  "That means that 
if you have Guiledart's signal maskers they must be left here.  The last 
thing we need is for them to know we can hide from them.  You are to bombard 
the shields with everything you've got.  Make them think it's the real 
attack.  We need to be under the shields within ten minutes after the first 
attack.  We then come around and flank them.  This gives them no where to 
run."
